title: Help Identifying Font!
content:
Can anyone help me to identify this font? I originally thought Fenway Park, however the “R” stroke has a gap in the original and the “y” and “a” seem to have a more squared finish.

I’ve searched high and low, is there anyone that can help me out?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828095650im_/http:/typophile.com/files/royals1_6152.jpg)

 [‹ Noah's Ark, yo!](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828095650/http:/typophile.com/node/45426 "Go to previous forum topic") [Stella McCartney logo ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828095650/http:/typophile.com/node/4801 "Go to next forum topic")
author: readmore

comments.content:
I haven’t looked, but I would have to guess it’s hand-lettered. Very rarely will you find a script logotype that is made from a font, especially for such a high-profile identity.

If you want something similar, veer.com has a bazillion script fonts. You could also try house industries or letterheadfonts.com
